name: IOI Collection
description:
The IOI Collection includes classic games from IO Interactive, including the first five games in the award-winning Hitman franchise and the cult-classic Freedom Fighters.

Here’s what you get:
  • Freedom Fighters
  • Hitman: Codename 47
  • Hitman 2: Silent Assassin
  • Hitman: Contracts
  • Hitman: Blood Money
  • Hitman: Absolution

Languages, features and system requirements may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
